TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EmbeddingToolReductionStrategy extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Extensions.AI.IToolReductionStrategy
Public NotInheritable Class EmbeddingToolReductionStrategy Implements IToolReductionStrategy

Docs.summary: A tool reduction strategy that ranks tools by embedding similarity to the current conversation context.
Docs.remarks: The strategy embeds each tool (name + description by default) once (cached) and embeds the current conversation content each request. It then selects the top toolLimit tools by similarity.

Maximum number of tools to return, excluding required tools. Must be greater than zero.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a function that determines whether a tool is required (always included).
Docs.remarks: If this returns , the tool is included regardless of ranking and does not count against the configured non-required tool limit. A tool explicitly named by (when is non-null) is also treated as required, independent of this delegate's result.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to preserve original ordering of selected tools. If (default), tools are ordered by descending similarity. If , the top-N tools by similarity are re-emitted in their original order.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the selector used to generate a single text string from a tool.
Docs.remarks: Defaults to: Name + "\n" + Description (omitting empty parts).
